short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweet faster with the power of Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ShoutBox is a Chrome Extension that turns the Chrome's address bar into your own personal Twitter tweeter. ShoutBox makes tweeting on the desktop speedy and simple.

Ever realized that even when you're sitting right in front of the computer you reach for your phone to tweet? Tweeting on mobile is a lot more streamlined and quicker than opening Twitter in the browser. ShoutBox changes this, just type "@" and tap your spacebar and you're ready to Tweet!
